Posts.Content: Msharmonyj wrote: hello everyone. I am new to this group. I have not been diagnosed, but I am concerned. I’ve noticed about 6 months ago, my breasts look like they have open pores... (kind of like when it’s hot outside and your pores on your face seem enlarged) these “pores” seem to be worse on my under boob, I’m not sure if that’s normal; as I do have large breasts. I also have this red rash under my breast (like bursted blood vessels) munch breast do not hurt. I do have children and have breast fed for short period of times before. I am truly just concerned and have schedule an appointment for the end of january. FOr anyone who has been diagnosed with IBC, what were your earliest signs/symptoms? Thank you in advance Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breasts pitting/reddish rash.. could it BE IBC? Msharmonyj Michelle_in_cornland
